Game Quality: Buggy. Has always been buggy. There are bugs that are still in the game from its first year. Every update introduces new bugs.

New Player Accessible: No. Matchmaking is a joke, new killers will end up getting high rank survivors, and new survivors will get high rank killers. Community also too toxic for the game to be enjoyable for new players.

Community: Both sides whine constantly about certain aspects of the game, some complaints are warranted, most are not. Killer complaints seem to be listened to more seriously, which is why the game has gradually been changed over time to cater to killers, making it easier for new killers to get good results and experienced killers to just make the game unenjoyable for everyone else involved in the match.

Balance: In short its awful. As a blank slate, with no perks and add ons, you could argue it has the right balance. However, with perks and add ons the balance is grossly swayed in favour of killers. Killers have an arsenal of perks that can make matches an unbearable grind for survivors, with these perks, the only chance survivors have is if the killer is a complete potato. There's also the fact that some killer have add ons that just break the game, such as the Huntress' iridescent heads. Furthermore, the devs still seem to think that mori's and keys are fair mechanics; the former being a cheap way for killers to end a match quickly and the keys being cheap and undeserved escape for survivors before all gens are complete.

In Summary: The devs are out of touch with the community and the stuff that really matters to us. Instead of squashing bugs and addressing major issues with the game, they prefer to pump out new killers/survivors, produce cosmetics and implement a season pass system that is unimaginative, grindy and promotes toxic playstyles. 

If you don't own this game yet, keep it that way. You may have some fun with it but the negative experiences you'll have will far outweigh the positives.

Update 9th Feb 2021:

They just made the game 10x worse with new survivor animations that ruin the previously tight running mechanics and a new HUD which is horrendous and requires effort to look at for information.

The devs do not care about the players. This latest update was met with unanimous disapproval in the PTB, yet they stuck to their guns and went live with it. All they care about is pumping out new content and making money. Years of bugs and poorly balanced perks/mechanics that they have said repeatedly is on their list of things to address, yet they instead make changes that no one asked for and makes the experience less fun.

Updated: 22 Oct @ 9:15pm

The game is broken. Don't believe in the recent and overall review (Mostly Positive) at the store page.

Attempting to get a refund. Will update if I do.

======================================================================

Updated: 22 Oct @ 8:07pm

EDIT UPDATE: Now that I put in a lot of hours into the game I can give readers a much more accurate information.

Unfortunately this game is still infested with cheaters. The only way to fix this is to remove the option "invite a friend" when lobbying as a killer. This would reduce the cheaters tremedously from inviting their friend as a survivor to kill the rest and farm points together.

I don't know why the developers did not do an immeadiate update to fix this problem as it has been 3-4 months since its release. 

Players are now changing their steam profile to private or offline to hide their friends list to continue to cheat new players with their premade friend/s.

My guess is that the developers don't care about this problem (there is no way to report ingame or on the developers website) as long as they get their $20. 

For you guys that want to buy this $20 game, don't. The developers don't have a general service to report cheating. This game has a small community to report cheating but it is not 100% reliable. 

There is no use in naming and shaming cheaters and will get you banned by moderators.

Just wait for when the Behaviour / Starbreeze developers finally take responsibility that removes this "invite a friend" option in the game. 


But until then, this game encourages players to cheat.


======================================================================

Posted: 5 Oct @ 2:00pm	

The Good - This game is great. Very fun and simple mechanics. Love it!

The Bad - P2P connection causes lag, long waits in the lobby.

The Ugly - Ruined by INCREDIBLE amount of cheaters (example: survivor/s is premade with the killer) where the killer downs his friend so that the downed survivor can locate the rest of the survivor for the killer. Once the rest is dead, they farm maximum points possible together, robbing other players of leveling. (I have video content of my gameplay with the cheaters)

TL;DR: Go on YouTube and type "Dead by Daylight cheating". This is the game you will play 50% of the time with either a hacker or premade farmers. If you like being robbed, buy this game.

比较推荐的一款游戏，为什么这么说呢，现在的游戏乱七八糟，没什么新颖的地方，黎明杀机让我们这些玩家眼前一亮，游戏内容、玩法等等很新颖，玩起来很刺激，不知不觉中自己的肾上腺素又分泌了一大截。
    但是，有一点作为玩家我还是有点不明白，开发者设计这款游戏的初衷是什么，不就是“猫抓老鼠”吗，老鼠在利用自身的技能，身边各种东西躲藏，而猫也有自身的优势。既然不是正面冲突型的游戏，既然需要小心、躲闪、藏匿，玩的好老鼠自然溜猫，为大家争取时间，那为什么要取消无敌点（LT），这样猫抓老鼠一抓一个准，还有什么意思逃跑。玩的好自然不会去计较，但是大部分人是像我一样普通的玩家，没那么高的游戏智商和操作，游戏的设置是不是应该面向最大多数的大众，让最大多数人体验到游戏的乐趣，而不是把把失败的挫败感，可以适当的调节一下屠夫的得分，不能让屠夫被溜了，或者只抓住一只老鼠而达不到段位。

心痛！！为什么呢！！本来基友4人一起排逃跑，结果拍了一个多小时的队伍。在这一个小时里，我们一直不停的匹配到一个开外挂的屠夫，游戏排队不停的在退出。那个外挂屠夫开了个房间，每次都匹配的他，为毛啊！全中国只剩下一个屠夫了么TUT 然后我抱着悲痛的心（冷漠.jpg）退出了队伍 ，没错，宝宝决定去单排！奇迹再次发生，又是外挂屠夫！我怀疑还是之前那个屠夫。我就不信了我还！于是机智的我把steam的 位置设在了日本，·······多大仇多大怨！再去排！还是个外挂屠夫！能忍？？？最终拍了一个多小时的队伍，4个人不欢而散。心疼自己。       
排队1小时，游戏0分钟。真开心呀3333
嗯。大概这外挂屠夫爱上了我们几个偷电贼，你去哪我就在哪，嘿嘿嘿。

All right ladies and gents, throw everything you thought you knew about the Horror genre out the window cuz these monsters act nothing like Hollywood! Let's get right down to it.
Pros:
+ A lot of great maps and locations
+Monsters are awesome as hell
+Teamwork makes the dream work
+Leaving someone as bait is useful
+THE MUSIC MAKES ME TENSE
+The heartbeat mechanic is very clever
+Mistakes have huge consequences(like failing a generator repair)
Cons:
-The Nurse is too fucking OP(I'm not kidding, I played her once and the match was over in 3 minutes)
-Teamwork is also based on a telekenetic link, as there is no way to communicate with anyone
-Most teammates are out for themselves
-Monsters tend to camp around the victims they place on hooks,(which sucks because the only way to get off of them is through either a teammate saving you [which is a low % chance] or removing yourself from the hook[also low, but lower than the teammate saving you])
-Some various graphical bugs here and there(nothing too distracting)
-Takes some time to find a match as a survivor
Overall:
I believe that this game is pretty good, but could(hopefully) get better in time.
Rating: 7/10

Dead by Daylight - это когда:
- поиск с друзьями идет годами
- ты мечтал попадать в комманду с тиммейтами у которых 1-20 часов в игре.
- твою маму любит все коммьюнити
- фейскемпят за шестеренку, за фонарь, юзание досок и окон, за часы, да и за все-все-все. 
- отбегал 5 генераторов и лег на ноеде
- два прыжка в одно окно называют "абузом"
- когда пилят крюки, всегда говорят, что у них дейлик
- маньяки думают что осколок имба
- в чате узнаешь много новых слов
- вторые ворота всегда закрыты
- ты стоишь у люка с маньяком полчаса
- разрабы называют "кемпинг" "патрулём" :DDDD
- в обучающем видео за киллера, учат "патрулировать" на траппере
- искал катку минут 20 и маньяк ливнул прочекав твой профиль
- ливают из игры когда вср*ли катку
- получил хит находясь в метре от окна
- не успел закрыть сундук и тебя распилили
- оттащили за зад, когда ты уже был на другой стороне доски
- маньяк не разбивает доски и плачет на "карусель"
- тебя тепешит всю катку,когда у маньяка большой пинг, а он фейсит тебя за это и обвиняет тебя
- все "топ" пилы и медсестры играют от лежачих, кемперя на земле с нюрс коллингом и дир сталкером. 
- ведьма ставит 10 ловушек вокруг крюка и ходит в метре
- маньяк убьет всех, а одного сурва выпустит в люк
- все бегут в подвал чтобы чекнуть сундук!!!!!!!
- ты сделал минус четыре, без кемпинга и лежачих, и тебе напишут, что ты кемпер
- эксклюзивные скины есть почти у всех
- убер-престиж может получить любая 20-ка, а также бесконечные топовые вещи, перки и подношения, прописав себе "сейв", который можно легко найти в инете 
- когда ты играешь за сурва, а тебя путают с маньяком челики с фонарём
- фул престижный Хилл Билл никогда не заводит в катке пилу
- в чате нужно всем промыть рот с мылом
- каждый маньяк и сурв придумывает свои правила игры, под которые должны подстроиться все
- маньяк застрял в паллете 
- маньяк предложит пофармить, а потом убьет тебя
- отпустил в люк сурва, а он написал тебе "изи"
- тиммейты страшней маньяка
- при побеге из подвала, тебе всегда заблочат окно здоровые сурвы
- подвальная паллета кидается просто так!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
- через 2 минуты после начала катки, все доски лежат, а генераторы стоят
- сурв ставит в фонарь две катушки
- маньяк который фейсил за шестеренку, играя за сурва берет шестеренку 
- пилят крюки, когда открыты ворота, и очков за них уже не дают
- первая катка в день начинается с мементо
- маньяк берет хватку и агитацию
- на майерсе берут перки ноед, порча: пожирание надежды, аддон на бесконечную третюю стадию и эбенновое мементо за одну катку
- пила на ноеде "тащит"
- если ты не кемпер - ты лох, а если кемпер - то м*дак
- катка не начинается в полном составе, либо кто-то ливает, либо кого-то выбивает
- подставной сурв в стаке с маньком бодиблочит тебя всю игру, а потом фармит со своим другом, когда все отъехали
- кемпер играя на сурве, кидает репорт другому кемперу за кемперство 
- от фейскемпинга нельзя снять
- половина перков просто бесполезны и неюзабельны
- маньяк повесит тебя в подвал и будет чекать все шкафчики, пока ты висишь, а потом будет п*здеть что видел следы
- сурвы всю катку ломают тотемы
- если ты сломал заряженный тотем тебя зафейсят
- маньяк будет стоять за крюком в инсидиусе
- тебя будут мементить две минуты, пока ты не истечешь кровью
- если ты Джейк, то за крюки в любом случае умрешь ты, даже если их не пилил
- играют одни "профессионалы", которые ждут люк, пока ты отъезжаешь на крюке.
- разработчики на стриме, говорят "все будет!" и смотрят картинки
it's so funny

Dead by Daylight is a same that is supposed to be thrilling and "scary" in a way for the survivors. The first time I ever played this game in the beta, was with my friends and it was an amazing experience. I was being chased by a very scary over-powering killer who laid down hard to detect traps and roamed around the map in a thrilling way. When he came near my heartbeat rose and I must say it was one of the better experiences I have had playing games as of lately.

Fast forward 5 months, now I have 350 hours in this game, rank 1 survivor and killer (not that that means anything because its literally just a grind and doesn't take much skill or game knowledge) and mainly play killer. The game has turned into a point farming tease fest between the killers, who leave bodies on the ground to use as bait, camp hooks, get salty about infinites, and the survivors, who whine at killers who use anything "scummy" in any way shape or form, such as No-one escapes death, hook camping strategies, and even as stupid as just playing the nurse or hillbilly (who are by far the best killers and don't even come in any range of the other two)

Even with all of this, I would recommend this game to people, because it is a very entertaining experience to be in a game where everyone is new, killer and survivors, as it makes the game just so much fun and I still have amazing memories of it and I wish I could go back.

[h1]Überragend Atmospärisch![/h1]

Angefixt durch das Let's Play von Gronkh und Co. habe ich mich nach gewissem Zögern zum Kauf entschieden. War ich anfangs noch skeptisch im Hinblick auf die Langzeitmotivation und ob wirkliches Teamplay zustande kommt, oder doch wieder jeder nur sein eigenes Ding macht, hat mich Dead by Daylight zumindest für den Moment komplett überzeugt und in seinen Bann gezogen.

Hinsichtlich der Langzeitmotivation kann ich nur orakeln, ob meiner gerade mal 12h Spielzeit, aber das wird sich weisen.
Dead by Daylight überzeugt aber schon in den ersten Minuten im laufenden Spiel, denn es fesselt durch seine Atmosphäre und die überragend aufgebaute Spannung. Startet man sein erstes Spiel als Überlebender und erfährt direkt das Glück eines rasenden Herzschlags, zeigt das Spiel direkt was es kann. Derart mitgefiebert habe ich bisher in sonst keinem Spiel.

Meine Bedenken im Hinblick auf das Teamplay unter den Spielern haben sich auch recht schnell zerschlagen. Natürlich gibt es wie in jedem Spiele Leute, die nur auf den eigenen Vorteil Bedacht sind - und das durchaus direkt im Chat ankündigen ala "if an exit is open, I won't help you". Aber, großes [b]ABER[b], die meisten meiner Mitspieler waren immer auf Teamplay aus, und sind nicht direkt geflüchtet, sondern haben auf die anderen Überlebenden gewartet oder versucht ihnen zu Helfen wenn diese in der Klemme waren. Da Teamplay in diesem Spiel immer ein Risiko darstellt, bin ich ob der gemachten Erfahrungen sehr positiv überrascht.
Soweit ich das bisher beurteilen kann, ist das Spiel ganz gut balanced, bisher ist mir zumindest nichts persönlich aufgefallen und auch die Perks etc. bieten eine ausreichende Vielfalt. Alles in allem muss ich sagen, macht das Spiel wirklich was her und rechtfertigt seinen Preis definitiv. Jeder der Lust auf Teamplay und Nervenkitzel hat, sollte sich die Anschaffung von Dead by Daylight mal durch den Kopf gehen lassen.
Das einzige was mir bisher, negativ aufgefallen ist, dass es manchmal etwas länger dauert bis man in eine Lobby kommt. Aber da ich bisher meist alleine Spiele hält sich die Wartezeit generell in Grenzen.

[b]Pro:[/b]
[list]
[*]Sehr Atmosphärisch und mitreissend
[*]große Auswahl an Perks
[*]scheint alles soweit Balanced
[*]Teamplay
[/list]

[b]Contra:[/b]
[list]
[*]Wartezeiten in Lobbys
[/list]

玩過史上第一個在三個月內更新成最爛的遊戲

I used to love the game but now its horrible Boon totems fucked the meta, and playing killer is an exercise in stress and misery. Are survivors overpowered? Yes. Are killers overpowered? Sometimes! However even when I do well as killer I feel gross and bad because its just so much sweaty effort to get to that point. Like, the 5-14 mins of stress was simply not worth the win.

I feel kinda stupid with some of these loops, and with every patch the game just gets worse. I thought 2016 was bad but if only I had known how bad boil over would be after the update. Several maps have infinite loops and are not being kill switched. Many bugs exist that give survivors the ability to have perma aura reading. Every 3rd game I play has a fucking hacker in it. Like man, I used to have fun but now its just too much stress. I like DBD but I hate what its become. I hope in future it will get better but for now 2k hours of my life have been flushed down the toilet. 

I bought every dlc from the doctor to pin head. I stopped playing for a bit after the NFT problem and Boon totems made it hard to come back. I hope yall have more fun than I do.

I won't mention anything about game balancing. The gameplay is fun, playing with friends is superb, even solo is fine.
But the reason I don't recommend this game is its performance. 

Game consumes too much resources, i.e. RAM and CPU. This game even uses more resources than DOTA2 with this much graphic content.
I can play BF4 smoothly at 60fps but can only get at most 40 fps for this game.
Your CPU will become a jet turbine when you play this game.
You may get disturbed every time you play with your friends due to the co-op system being so awkward to deal with.

Gameplay is fine, but the system performance is bad.

Dead By Daylight is a cool looking horror game, unfortunetly the matchmaking is not that great, finding a game can take a lot of time, that's the main issue.

Pros:
-Nice graphic style
-Simple understandable UI
-Good upgrade system (called the Bloodweb in the game)
-Good Gameplay in general
-Original sounds effect when the killer approach ( I personally never saw that in a multipalyer horror game before)

-Cons:
-Matchmaking, takes a lot of time to queue with friends.
-Useless perks
-Character balance (Meg's perks compared to Dwights perks....)
-Not much of character customization in the base game... (3 cloths for each part of the body)

or if you're more in numbers review, here's some numbers.
[b]Graphics:	[/b] 7/10 Althrough they are good, they are not the best. But I the style of graphics is still very good
[b]Sound effect	[/b]: 8/10 The sound effects are a big part of that game
[b]Matchmaking:	[/b] 4/10 Poorly optimized when playing with friend, the 4 is for the recognition of the solo queue which is fine
[b]General Gameplay:	[/b] 8/10 Very original horror style gameplay. It really gives the suspence sensation whenever you hear the killer approaching. 

[b]Average Score:	[/b] 6.75/10

The average score is over 6, so i'm personally going to rate this, a positive product. I recommend this game.

Points Positifs : Le jeu a un gameplay assez innovant pour les jeux d'horreur. Pas de screamers. Sais maintenir une tension suffisante sans paralyser par la peur.
Point négatifs : Jouer tueur est devenu un enfer depuis que les devs on laissé l'option pour que tout le monde puisse casser les hooks. Le jeu est assez laid. Cruel manque d'optimisation. Communauté passables . Le peer to peer occasionne aussi quelques bugs de type Lag

Conclusion : Si vous aimez les slashers, que vous avez un pc dans la norme des pc gameurs et une connexion de 16Mb/s environ descendant (Idéalement même si on peut avoir moins.) alors foncez ce jeu est pour vous

Quando laggers caem no jogo, fica ridiculo, eles ficam sendo privilegiados pelo teletransporte e quem ta jogando de matador não tem condições, pois o cara some de uma vez. Sinto muito, mas esse privilégio para quem tem internet ruim queimou o jogo.

I have played since closed alpha and the game has managed to vastly improve on what was already amazing at release.
DBD is a great multiplayer game to play solo or with friends. It has plenty of content that can be bought or earned over time, and every game is somehow different. As with all multiplayer games there are a few balancing issues here and there, but the game is balanced well enough so long as you don't get put against really toxic players.
Only issue I've really had worth mentioning is matchmaking. Waiting times are very dependent on times of day, and the ranks of people you are put against seem to differ greatly from your own, and some peoples ranks are very unrepresentative of their actual skill.
But that aside, the game itself at its core is fantastic along with the developers, and I would recommend to anyone.
